Dragons of Tarkir Mobile Spoiler DoT Mobile DoT
Skywise Teachings
3U
Enchantment
U

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you pay pay 1U. If you do, put a 2/2 blue Djinn Monk creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

Ojutai's words must be translated from Draconic before his followers can benefit from their wisdom.
